title: We are hiring: Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to lead digital campaigns.
job_overview:
We are hiring: Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to lead digital campaigns.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on skillset

Your Role:

Run campaigns on Google & Facebook Ads.

Analyze data, track KPIs.

Work remotely with independence.

Requirements:

1+ year experience in paid advertising.

Strong attention to campaign performance.
